overview:
Alun is from the heart of the mining Valley’s of S.Wales and a very proud Welshman

Alun has helped build the European footprints of a number of e US software firms and been the successful Non Exec Chair of two global boutique Infrastructure Consultancies, the latest Citihub, which is growing like crazy.

18 months ago Alun decided to change the world of global careers advice and development by building a social network for careers which answers the question…”What do you want to be When You Grow Up” - or WYGU for short.

A lover of most sports, skiing, football and rugby and the company of interesting people particularly if shared with a good bottle of Bordeaux
